# Pangasinan Presidents

| imagesize     = Pangasinan Presidrnts 1998.jpg
| leagues       = MBA (1998-1999)
| founded       = 1998
| history       = Pangasinan Presidents1998-1999
| arena         = Don Narciso Ramos Sports Complex and Dagupan City People's Astrodome
| location      = Pangasinan, Philippines
| colors        = Red, Blue  and white
| president     =
| coach         = Dong Vergeire & Chot Reyes
| championships =
| website       =
}}
The Pangasinan Presidents were a professional basketball team in the now-defunct Metropolitan Basketball Association from 1998 to 1999. The Presidents name were the Philippines Presidents Ramos is from Pangasinan at the team owner is Tim Orbos, a brother of Gov. Oscar Orbos from Bani, Pangasinan.
Pangasinan team is one of the 12 original teams in the MBA.
